Do you speak German? Are you interested in German culture? Come join the German Conversation Hour! All levels are welcome!  Meetings are Online via Google Hangouts/Meet: Click on a meeting time below to join the Conversation.  Wednesdays 12-1pm  Have questions? Contact Dr. Susanne Rott .
